mapper.select:
select
from goods_oper_log where 1=1
and admin_user like CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{adminUser}), '%')
and op_type like CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{opType}), '%')
and good_id like CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{goodId}), '%')
and order_id like CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{orderId}), '%')
order by op_time desc limit #{0},#{1}

select count(*) from goods_oper_log where 1=1
and admin_user like CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{adminUser}), '%')
and op_type like CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{opType}), '%')
and good_id like CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{goodId}), '%')
and order_id like CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{orderId}), '%')
